text:
In the file CATALINA_HOME/webapps/examples/jsp/simpletag/foo.jsp, there is a
reference to debug-taglib:

<snip>

<%@ taglib uri="http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/debug-taglib" prefix="d"%>

</snip>

This taglib is resolved in web.xml to /WEB-INF/jsp/debug-taglib.tld.  However,
this file does not exist under /WEB-INF/jsp/.

When this taglib tag is commented out, the JSP runs fine.
creator: greg@visualmining.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3739 ***
creator: remm@apache.org
